notes: Experimental ‘fat-targeting’ research peptide from preclinical work; no established human clinical use; avoid protocols.

aliases: vasoactive intestinal peptide|vasoactive intestinal polypeptide|vip peptide

notes: Human antimicrobial peptide (cathelicidin); studied in immune/skin contexts; avoid protocol claims and do not present as approved.
Cosmetic peptide (topical) marketed for wrinkle appearance; cosmetic-use evidence; avoid medical claims.
FDA-approved oxytocin (Rx) uterotonic; include only label-level indications; no protocols.
FDA-approved chorionic gonadotropin hormone (Rx); include only label-level indications; no protocols.
Antioxidant tripeptide (GSH) widely used as supplement/adjunct; evidence varies by route/formulation; avoid protocol claims.
Nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide; common ‘NAD+’ supplement/infusion topic (not a peptide). Claims vary by formulation/route; avoid protocols.
5-Amino-1MQ is an investigational small molecule discussed in metabolic contexts; limited human evidence; avoid protocols.
Ibutamoren (MK-677) is a small-molecule ghrelin receptor agonist / GH secretagogue (not a peptide); investigational/controlled contexts; avoid protocols.
Melanotan I is an α-MSH analog; closely related to afamelanotide (drug). Keep claims conservative; avoid protocols.
Afamelanotide is an approved melanocortin analog in specific indications; include only label-level indications; avoid protocols.
Investigational long-acting amylin analog studied for weight management; avoid protocol claims and do not present as approved.
FDA-approved pramlintide (Symlin) amylin analog (Rx) for glycemic control adjunct in diabetes; include only label-level indications; no protocols.
Investigational dual agonist (GLP-1 receptor + glucagon receptor) studied for metabolic/weight indications; avoid protocol claims and do not present as approved.

GLP-1/GIP/GCGR tri-agonist; investigational; avoid protocol claims
